data.fullContent: Cell phones are now used not only for personal phone calls, but they are used by businesses and employees to access email, share files file sharing, and access chat applications in addition to allowing users to check their schedules and appointments. Many surveys have been conducted to determine why people use cell phones. These recent results indicate that people who use cell phones use them for most of their communication, whether it is personal communication or business communication. Cell phones can be used when people are away from the office and where there is no internet connection. In addition, many people prefer to communicate via text because it is faster and easier than writing a letter or using email. A recent study by the Innova Research Foundation found that texters send an average of thirty-six messages per day compared to ten messages sent by email. This just speaks to how predominant the cell phone has become as a communication device in the business world.

q1.translation: 手机现在不仅用于私人电话，还被企业和员工用于访问电子邮件、共享文件、访问聊天应用程序，此外还允许用户查看他们的日程安排和约会。为了确定人们使用手机的原因进行了许多调查。这些最新的结果表明，使用手机的人使用他们的大部分交流，无论是私人交流还是商务交流。
q1.front: Cell phones are now used not only for personal phone calls, but they are used by businesses and employees to access email, share files file sharing, and access chat applications in addition to allowing users to check their schedules and appointments. Many surveys have been conducted to determine why people use cell phones. These recent results indicate that people who use cell phones use them for most of their communication, whether it is personal communication or business communication.
q1.content: Cell phones are now used not ____ for personal phone calls, but they are used by businesses and employees to access email, share files file sharing, and access chat applications in addition to ____ users to check their schedules and appointments. Many surveys have been conducted to determine ____ people use cell phones. These recent results indicate that ____ who use ____ phones use them for most of ____ communication, whether it is personal ____ or business communication.

q2.translation: 手机现在不仅用于私人电话，还被企业和员工用于访问电子邮件、共享文件、访问聊天应用程序，此外还允许用户查看他们的日程安排和约会。为了确定人们使用手机的原因进行了许多调查。这些最新的结果表明，使用手机的人使用他们的大部分交流，无论是私人交流还是商务交流。当人们不在办公室或者没有网络连接的时候，手机可以被使用。此外，许多人更喜欢通过短信交流，因为它比写信或使用电子邮件更快更容易。Innova研究基金会最近的一项研究发现，发短信的人平均每天发送36条信息，而发电子邮件的人平均每天发送10条信息。这恰恰说明了手机在商业世界中作为一种通信设备是多么的占主导地位。
q2.front: Cell phones are now used not only for personal phone calls, but they are used by businesses and employees to access email, share files file sharing, and access chat applications in addition to allowing users to check their schedules and appointments. Many surveys have been conducted to determine why people use cell phones. These recent results indicate that people who use cell phones use them for most of their communication, whether it is personal communication or business communication.
q2.middle: Cell phones can be used when people are away from the office and where there is no internet connection.
q2.ending: In addition, many people prefer to communicate via text because it is faster and easier than writing a letter or using email. A recent study by the Innova Research Foundation found that texters send an average of thirty-six messages per day compared to ten messages sent by email. This just speaks to how predominant the cell phone has become as a communication device in the business world.

options.sentence: Businesses can also use tools to monitor employee cell phone use and then alert managers when inappropriate use is detected.
Cell phones can be used when people are away from the office and where there is no internet connection.
Businesses are installing computer networks called "enterprise networks" to provide employees with a direct connection to the Internet.
Wireless is just one way that people are connecting in the 21st century.

options.sentence: Cell phones have become the primary way businesses and employees communicate..
In the 1990s, most small businesses were not seriously concerned with the capabilities of computers to store and process electronic data.
Cell phone theft is a major problem that can lead to lawsuits, as well as expensive fines and legal fees for the company.
Thanks to cell phones, banking transactions can be monitored and updated, thereby saving money and time for all involved.
